scripts.dev: if exist .env.local (rename .env.local .env.local.bak) && cross-env NODE_ENV=development next dev --turbopack
scripts.dev:no-turbo: if exist .env.local (rename .env.local .env.local.bak) && cross-env NODE_ENV=development next dev
scripts.build: (if exist .env.local.bak (rename .env.local.bak .env.local)) && cross-env NODE_ENV=production next build && powershell -Command "(Get-Item .\web.config).LastWriteTime = Get-Date"
scripts.build:test: (if exist .env.local.bak (rename .env.local.bak .env.local)) && cross-env NODE_ENV=test next build && powershell -Command "(Get-Item .\web.config).LastWriteTime = Get-Date"
scripts.build:prod: (if exist .env.local.bak (rename .env.local.bak .env.local)) && cross-env NODE_ENV=production next build && powershell -Command "(Get-Item .\web.config).LastWriteTime = Get-Date"
